automation_yaml:
id: 'office_living_room_evening_routine_1700000000'
alias: 'Daily 5PM Office and Living Room Lighting'
description: "At 5:00 PM every day, brighten the Office WLED to 80%, then after a short delay adjust the Living Room light and dim the Office WLED to 40%."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '17:00:00'
conditions: []
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 80
  - delay: '00:01:00'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness_pct: 60
  - delay: '00:00:30'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 40
